description: Number of polyhexes rooted at a hexagon and containing n hexagons.
references: F. Harary and R. C. Read, The enumeration of tree-like polyhexes, Proc. Edinb. Math. Soc. (2) 17 (1970), 1-13.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..200
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
